docs.snippet: False claims posted on Twitter were 70 percent more likely to be shared than the truth, researchers at M.I.T. found. And people appear to prefer false news.

headline.print_headline: Why We’re Easily Seduced by False News
headline.main: It’s True: False News Spreads Faster and Wider. And Humans Are to Blame.

docs.snippet: With their victory after a nine-day walkout, West Virginia teachers demonstrated a new model for collective labor action beyond the traditional parameters of unions.
